data.title: About
data.text:
ABOUT US

The city of Torrance is consistently known for being a safe city, as well as home to the birthplace of the American Youth Soccer Organization, famous Olympians, actors, and entrepreneurs.

Torrance beach is the southernmost beach along the coastline starting from Santa Monica Bay, extending from Malibu to the Palos Verdes Peninsula.

Torrance bikes showroom is situated in the middle of the beautiful Palos Verdes peninsula on the south, 2 miles east of Redondo Beach pier.

Torrance Bikes is located within a 20-minute drive from LAX, multiple hotels within a mile radius, 1.5 miles from the pristine beach, 2.5 miles of shopping bliss, a house of famous breweries, and hundreds of small business restaurants to world-famous fast-food restaurants.

We are here with a promise to serve the neighborhood residents, as well as tourists visiting for pleasure or business. We proudly offer our best electric or pedal bikes. Our bike shop provides brand new fleets of bikes for those who want to cover the city bikeriding with ease.
